original_title: The Strategy of Broncho Billy's Sweetheart
overview: Broncho Billy shoots an outlaw for making a disrespectful remark about his sweetheart. After the shooting he hastens to her home and tells her he has shot a man, but does not know who he is. Shortly after the remainder of the gang of outlaws arrive and, to learn the direction Broncho went, tell her it was her father who was shot.
title: The Strategy of Broncho Billy's Sweetheart
